extracted_information: The Farfetch app's 'add to bag' user flow was wireframed, highlighting key UI patterns and navigation structures. Distinct from the mobile website, the app utilizes a persistent bottom navigation bar. User interactions frequently involve pop-in components for product listings and confirmation messages, streamlining the user experience and maintaining context.

navigation_structures.main_navigation: Bottom Navigation Bar (replaces burger menu/top bar)

step_1_homepage.description: Starting point with common UI elements.

step_2_story_template.description: Instagram-inspired template for editorial product selection, accessed from homepage image click.

step_3_product_list_page.description: Appears as a pop-in window after clicking CTA from story template, allowing easy return to previous view.

step_4_product_page.description: Accessed by clicking a specific product from the product list.

step_5_added_to_bag_notification.description: A pop-in notification confirming product addition, includes product recap for engagement. User can dismiss by clicking background/cross or view cart.

step_6_cart_page.description: Densest page, accessed by clicking 'View cart'.

features.name: Bottom Navigation Bar
features.description: Primary navigation element, replacing traditional top bars or hamburger menus, providing persistent access to core sections.

features.name: Story Template
features.description: Instagram-inspired full-screen format for presenting product selections with an editorial look and feel.

features.name: Pop-in Components
features.description: Used for displaying product lists and 'added to bag' notifications. This pattern allows users to view new content without fully navigating away, maintaining context and enabling easy dismissal.

features.name: Icons
features.description: Frequently used for actions (e.g., backwards, cart, share) and features (e.g., wishlist stars).

features.name: Call-to-Action (CTA) Buttons
features.description: Prominently featured throughout the flow to guide user actions (e.g., Add to Bag, View Cart).

features.name: Images
features.description: Central to product display and selection across homepage, story template, product list, and product pages.
